about_the_game:
Description:


Collect the coins! Because it's fun! Embrace the power of the mushrooms and find the escape. Keep an eye out for traps and and monsters, as some may surprise you... Iron Man permadeath mode has been implemented for you hardcore gamers that want to speedrun or time yourself--once you've learned the stages of course.

Controls:


Pause Menu - Escape Key

Player Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys for directions

Use Ladder - W and S to Climb Or Descend

Jump - Space Bar

Shoot Arrows - L-shift Click Or Hold


The core of this game was originally a student-made project. Building the rest of the game out took a couple of months. UI is tailored for 16:9 aspect ratio. (Ultrawide and other resolutions may encounter issues with UI and text)


Credits and thanks to users FOXFIN and DANIL CHERNYAEV from Unity's AssetStore for their 'Super Platformer Assets' and '2D Platformer Tileset' packs, respectively.

short_description: Jump into action in this addictive platformer where your goal is to collect as many coins as you can! Harness the power of mushrooms to find your way out. But beware! Traps and monsters lurk around every corner, ready to challenge your reflexes and strategy. How far can you push yourself?
